## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5783ba00914804b5d7742c83b4fcca8675ba681434846f7cbeb118900adb7e87)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cloudy-uvi-sense-v11' @ 99.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
